bill_title: require the state to pay for the costs of prosecution and defense for certain persons charged with crimes while in state adult correctional facilities.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require the state to pay for the costs of prosecution and defense for certain persons charged with crimes while in state adult correctional facilities. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The cost of the prosecution and defense of any person confined within a state adult correctional facility, who is charged with a crime while incarcerated in the facility, shall be paid by the state. This section does not apply to any person confined within a juvenile correction facility created pursuant to chapter 26-11A. 170 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.098 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
